definition: to offer an opinion/to comment (on the issue)/to have a say (in the matter)

sentences.english: Their love allows no one's interference.
The secrets of Universe are the same to us. They totally are out of our reach.
sentences.chinese: 对于宇宙的奥秘也是这样，我们完全没有置喙的空间。

definition: to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
lit. to go beyond the sacrificial altar and take over the kitchen (idiom); fig. to exceed one's place and meddle in other people's affairs/to take matters into one's own hands
to show an interest in/to get involved with
this is no small thing (idiom)/to have a serious matter at hand
to jump to an unfounded conclusion
to disobey/to defy an edict/to violate/to go against/to run counter to
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
